tool_description: Horoscope API - Professional Horoscopes as a simple JSON API - Access 12 horoscopes every day, written by professional astrologers. Important: Only Portuguese (PT) language is currently available.
title: Horoscope API

api_list.name: Get a daily horoscope
api_list.description: Get a daily horoscope for the horoscope sign.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com/{langid}/{signid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What's the horoscope for Aries today in Portuguese?
Can you give me today's horoscope for Taurus in Portuguese?
I'd like to know the daily horoscope for Gemini in Portuguese.
Please provide the horoscope for Cancer today in Portuguese.
What's the daily horoscope for Leo in Portuguese?
Can I get the Virgo horoscope for today in Portuguese?
Tell me the daily horoscope for Libra in Portuguese.
I'd like to see the Scorpio horoscope for today in Portuguese.
What's the horoscope for Sagittarius today in Portuguese?
Can you show me the Capricorn horoscope for today in Portuguese?

api_list.name: Glossary
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a JSON with information about the API. In it you can preview request and response templates, mandatory fields and much more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horoscope-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What information can I find in the Horoscope API glossary?
Show me the request and response templates available in the Horoscope API.
Can you provide details about the mandatory fields in the Horoscope API?
What kind of information does the Horoscope API glossary provide?
I want to learn more about the Horoscope API. Can you show me the glossary?
Where can I find a preview of the request and response templates for the Horoscope API?
Is there a glossary available for the Horoscope API that explains its features?
Can you show me the glossary for the Horoscope API to understand its usage better?
What does the Horoscope API glossary say about the available endpoints?
I need to see the glossary for the Horoscope API to check the available parameters.
